title: Mikky_m
author: Mikky_m
content: I was reading about a BTC staking platform lately, not because I planned to stake any BTC but just because I found it interesting that one of its sponsors was Binance Labs. Anyway, the project's name is Solv protocol and has up more than 25k Bitcoins staked on it since it's inception in 2021 and basically what it does is "provide a flexible and yield-generating solution for Bitcoin holders." Still that's not the most amusing fact I found while reading about the project. It's that even with the 25k BTC the project has presently, it's no where close to Blackrock and some other ETFs, it's just mind-blowing. Anyway, the project is a pretty good read and has quite a bit interesting features and advantages, if anyone knows about the project tell me what you think about it. Tq https://x.com/SolvProtocol

comments.author: Bournesparks
comments.body: Quote from: Mikky_m on January 11, 2025, 02:40:44 PMI was reading about a BTC staking platform lately, not because I planned to stake any BTC but just because I found it interesting that one of its sponsors was Binance Labs. Anyway, the project's name is Solv protocol and has up more than 25k Bitcoins staked on it since it's inception in 2021 and basically what it does is "provide a flexible and yield-generating solution for Bitcoin holders." Still that's not the most amusing fact I found while reading about the project. It's that even with the 25k BTC the project has presently, it's no where close to Blackrock and some other ETFs, it's just mind-blowing. Anyway, the project is a pretty good read and has quite a bit interesting features and advantages, if anyone knows about the project tell me what you think about it. Tq https://x.com/SolvProtocolIf you're up to date with web3 community, you'll know Solv is on Binance megadrop thereby it could be a big shot. I'm also following up on this due to its utilities, some of which you've mentioned . It'llnalso be available on Bitget PoolX from 17th.  Poolx. If you didn't get into mega drop, this could be a good offer...
